description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，蒙古族。乌兰夫的孙女，布赫的女儿。曾任内蒙古自治区人民政府主席、中国共产党内蒙古自治区委员会常委及统战部部长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, of Mongol ethnicity. She is the granddaughter of Ulanhu and daughter of Buhe. She has served as the Chairwoman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region People's Government, a Standing Committee member of the CCP Inner Mongolia Committee, and head of its United Front Work Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国上将，曾任中华人民共和国副主席、国务院副总理及内蒙古自治区首任政府主席。布小林的祖父。
description.en: A founding general (shangjiang) of the People's Liberation Army, who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China, Vice Premier of the State Council, and the first Chairman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region. He is the grandfather of Bu Xiaolin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任全国人大常委会副委员长、内蒙古自治区政府主席。乌兰夫之子，布小林之父。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and Chairman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Government. He is the son of Ulanhu and father of Bu Xiaolin.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫的妻子，布赫的母亲，布小林的祖母。
description.en: Wife of Ulanhu, mother of Buhe, and grandmother of Bu Xiaolin.

description.zh-cn: 一场由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动，对中国的政治、经济和社会造成了深远的影响。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong, which had a profound impact on China's politics, economy, and society.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国吉林省长春市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Changchun, Jilin Province, China.

nodes.id: 内蒙古自治区人民政府

zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区人民政府
en: People's Government of Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区内蒙古自治区的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region, a provincial-level administrative region of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任内蒙古自治区人民政府主席，是布小林的前任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region People's Government and was the predecessor of Bu Xiaolin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，蒙古族，接替布小林出任内蒙古自治区人民政府主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, of Mongol ethnicity, who succeeded Bu Xiaolin as Chairwoman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，在布小林担任内蒙古自治区主席初期任中国共产党内蒙古自治区委员会书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as the Secretary of the CCP Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Committee during the early part of Bu Xiaolin's tenure as Chairwoman of Inner Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，在布小林担任内蒙古自治区主席期间任中国共产党内蒙古自治区委员会书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as the Secretary of the CCP Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Committee during Bu Xiaolin's tenure as Chairwoman of Inner Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，在布小林担任内蒙古自治区主席期间任中国共产党内蒙古自治区委员会书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as the Secretary of the CCP Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Committee during Bu Xiaolin's tenure as Chairwoman of Inner Mongolia.

nodes.id: 中国共产党内蒙古自治区委员会统一战线工作部

zh-cn: 中国共产党内蒙古自治区委员会统一战线工作部
en: United Front Work Department of the CCP Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党内蒙古自治区委员会负责统一战线工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the CCP Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Committee responsible for united front work.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会环境与资源保护委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会环境与资源保护委员会
en: Environment Protection and Resources Conservation Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一，负责环境与资源保护方面的立法和监督工作。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, responsible for legislation and supervision in the areas of environmental protection and resource conservation.

description.zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区阿拉善盟的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Alxa League in the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 中国共产党阿拉善盟委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党阿拉善盟委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在内蒙古自治区阿拉善盟的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Alxa League, Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国内蒙古自治区呼和浩特市下辖的一个旗，是布小林的出生地。
description.en: A banner under the administration of Hohhot, Inner Mongolia, China. It is the birthplace of Bu Xiaolin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1980年考入北京大学法律系，就读于新开设的经济法专业。
description.en: Enrolled in the Law Department of Peking University in 1980, studying in the newly established Economic Law program.

description.zh-cn: 在吉林大学法学院获得法学理论专业在职研究生学历和法学博士学位。
description.en: Obtained an on-the-job postgraduate qualification in legal theory and a Doctor of Law degree from the Law School of Jilin University.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命初期被打倒。
description.en: Was overthrown in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命初期被关押到伊克昭盟的牛棚。
description.en: Was detained in a cowshed in Ikh Juu League during the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.

中国共产党阿拉善盟委员会

description.zh-cn: 接替巴特尔出任内蒙古自治区代主席。
description.en: Succeeded Bagatur as the acting Chairwoman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 接替布小林出任内蒙古自治区主席职务。
description.en: Succeeded Bu Xiaolin as the Chairwoman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 接替布小林出任中共内蒙古自治区党委统战部部长。
description.en: Succeeded Bu Xiaolin as the Head of the United Front Work Department of the CCP Inner Mongolia Committee.

position.zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区人民政府主席
position.en: Chairwoman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region People's Government

description.zh-cn: 在布小林担任主席期间，王君任中共内蒙古自治区党委书记。
description.en: While Bu Xiaolin served as Chairwoman, Wang Jun was the Secretary of the CCP Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Committee.

position.zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区人民政府主席
position.en: Chairwoman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region People's Government

description.zh-cn: 在布小林担任主席期间，李纪恒任中共内蒙古自治区党委书记。
description.en: While Bu Xiaolin served as Chairwoman, Li Jiheng was the Secretary of the CCP Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Committee.

position.zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区人民政府主席
position.en: Chairwoman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region People's Government

description.zh-cn: 在布小林担任主席期间，石泰峰任中共内蒙古自治区党委书记。
description.en: While Bu Xiaolin served as Chairwoman, Shi Taifeng was the Secretary of the CCP Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Committee.
